title: Manage VIP Artist Hospitality Rider
description: The manager for a performing artist sends their hospitality rider, which must be fulfilled by the venue.

tasks.description: Review the hospitality rider for all food, beverage, and other requests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a list of all required items (e.g., '24 bottles of Fiji water', '1 bowl of green M&Ms').

tasks.description: Place an order with the venue's catering department for all food and beverage items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the catering order.

tasks.description: Coordinate with venue operations to ensure the dressing room is set up as specified in the rider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a task for the operations team to set up the dressing room.
